title: Small Blue Thing
description: When Alex finds a bracelet that connects her with the souls of the dead, the last thing she expects is to fall in love with one of them.Found buried in the mud of London’s River Thames, a beautiful bracelet connects Alex with Callum, a drowned soul damned to stalk the streets of the city. Neither ghost nor human, Callum is trapped – forced to steal the memories of unsuspecting humans to survive.But Callum has a secret. He can escape this torturous half-life, if Alex makes the ultimate sacrifice.Will Alex risk it all to save the one she loves?Note - Paperback is edition 1. For the latest, updated and revised edition, see the Kindle edition.
author: S.C. Ransom
